description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) as it directly uses user input in HTML output. It is also vulnerable to SQL Injection as it does not properly sanitize user input before using it in SQL queries. The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) as it does not implement any CSRF tokens. The function is also vulnerable to Path Traversal as it does not properly sanitize user input before using it in file system operations.
